      Card brand logo If the brand is unknown, returns default card icon.

    • メソッドの詳細

      • getLogoResourceId

        public static int getLogoResourceId(CardBrand $receiver)

        Card brand logo If the brand is unknown, returns default card icon.

        戻り値:
        drawable resource id of brand logo.
        関連項目:
        enum CardBrand

      • getCvcIconResourceId

        public static int getCvcIconResourceId(CardBrand $receiver)

        Icon of security code (a.k.a. cvc, cvv)

        戻り値:
        drawable resource id of icon.
